metadata.title: ZetisLabs — Automation powered by AI agents
metadata.description: ZetisLabs helps companies automate processes using intelligent agent-driven workflows.

hero.eyebrow: Stop wasting time on repetitive tasks
hero.subtitle: ZetisLabs builds custom automations that save you hours every week.

whatWeMake.title: What We Make
whatWeMake.description: ZetisLabs helps companies automate processes using intelligent agent-driven workflows. We build AI-powered automation solutions that transform how businesses operate.

aiAgents.title: AI Agents
aiAgents.description: Intelligent agents that understand context and execute complex workflows autonomously.

processAutomation.title: Process Automation
processAutomation.description: Streamline repetitive tasks and workflows to save time and reduce human error.

intelligentWorkflows.title: Intelligent Workflows
intelligentWorkflows.description: Build adaptive workflows that learn and improve over time with AI-powered insights.

enterpriseIntegration.title: Enterprise Integration
enterpriseIntegration.description: Seamlessly integrate with your existing tools and systems for unified automation.

exampleProjects.title: Example Projects
exampleProjects.description: See how we've helped companies automate their workflows and save valuable time.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Order Processing
ecommerce.description: Automated order fulfillment workflow that processes orders, updates inventory, and sends notifications, reducing processing time by 80%.

customerSupport.title: Customer Support Automation
customerSupport.description: AI-powered ticket routing and response system that handles common inquiries, freeing up support staff for complex issues.

dataMigration.title: Data Migration Pipeline
dataMigration.description: Intelligent data transformation and migration system that validates, cleans, and transfers data between systems seamlessly.

whyZetisLabs.title: Why ZetisLabs
whyZetisLabs.description: We combine cutting-edge AI technology with deep automation expertise to deliver solutions that work.

expertTeam.title: Expert Team
expertTeam.description: Our team brings years of experience in AI, automation, and enterprise software development.

customSolutions.title: Custom Solutions
customSolutions.description: Every automation is tailored to your specific needs and workflows, not a one-size-fits-all approach.

provenResults.title: Proven Results
provenResults.description: Our clients see measurable improvements in efficiency, accuracy, and time savings from day one.

ongoingSupport.title: Ongoing Support
ongoingSupport.description: We provide continuous monitoring, optimization, and support to ensure your automations stay effective.

scalableArchitecture.title: Scalable Architecture
scalableArchitecture.description: Built to grow with your business, handling increased volume and complexity as you expand.

securityFirst.title: Security First
securityFirst.description: Enterprise-grade security and compliance built into every solution from the ground up.

cta.title: Ready to Automate?
cta.description: Get a free audit of your workflows and discover how much time you could save with intelligent automation.
